duties_responsibilities.duty: Running C-ARM intraoperatively during surgical procedures.
Inventory, receive, and restock materials used for radiological services.
May be assigned radiation safety officers and/ or life skills officer duties.
Performing all other duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Completion of an accredited radiology program.
ARRT (The American Registry of Radiologic Technologists) certification as required by state.
Successful completion of BLS - CPR Course within 90 days of employment required or documentation of current certification.
